name: epollo
description:
What is it?

A free to use story sharing website where You can

  • Write your own stories
  • Fork others stories and continue them
  • Enter stories by generating different threads related to the original storyline
  • Play different writing challenges
  • Create different writing challenges
  • Chat with others
  • Have fun

How it works?

Simply. For uploading stories you must register first here and then

You can just read the stories even without registration.

Search for stories or users(authors), and fork those stories to your account for editing it. Also you can add a new storyline to others stories. After that you have to wait for the author's approve for the new line, and only if he/she approved the new line will be added and published in the original authors site.

Important please read this!
It's the time to talk about the license. Basically all stories must be original and only yours. Also we do not take any responsibility for the stories on this site which means only you are accountable for your own actions on this site. For sign in you have to accept this agreement.

But anyway we will censorship our stories so don't worry.

Getting started

First sign in

And then have fun! :)
